favourite.article: I really enjoyed this point that we need to be those that love the Lord; that way, He can make His home in our hearts to gain His corporate expression, His deepest heart's desire. Lord, make Your home in our hearts more today!
I like this hymn because it reminds me that the love of Christ is not apart from Himself. The love of Christ is Christ Himself. Love is Christ. Christ is love. Amen.
